testcase.classname: feature to test google search functionality
testcase.name: Validate Google Search is working
testcase.system-out: Given Broswer is open.......................................................passed And user is on Google Search page...........................................passed When user enters a text in search box.......................................passed And hits enter button.......................................................passed Then user is navigated to the search results................................passed

testcase.name: Check login is successful with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user clicks enters username and password...............................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user is navigated to the home page.....................................passed
